scripts.test:unit: TZ="Etc/UTC" NODE_ENV=test mocha {src,tests}/{**,**/**,**/**/**}/*.spec.ts --reporter list --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --recursive --exit --bail --timeout 120000
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test nyc --silent --cache false --nycrc-path .nyrc.json npm run test:unit && npm run test:coverage-report
scripts.clean:bin:
echo "
[$(date "+%T")] CLEAN BIN FOLDER" && rm -rf bin
scripts.clean:spec:
echo "
[$(date "+%T")] CLEAN TEST FILES" && rm -rf bin/tests && rm -rf bin/_test-utils.js && find bin -type f -name '*.spec.js' -exec rm {} +
scripts.copy:static:
echo "
[$(date "+%T")] COPYING STATIC" && cp -rf config bin/config
scripts.generate:commit:
echo "
[$(date "+%T")] GENERATE COMMIT FILE" && git rev-parse HEAD > bin/.commit
scripts.build:files:
echo "
[$(date "+%T")] BUILD FILES" && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && mkdir -p bin
scripts.build:
echo "
[$(date "+%T")] BUILD START..." && npm run copy:static && npm run generate:commit && npm run build:files && echo "
[$(date "+%T")] ALL DONE
"

hooks.pre-commit: lint-staged && npm run test && git add .
